text: ai eemaanadaaron khuda ke madadagaar ban jao jis tarah mariyam ke bete eesa ne havaariyon se kaha tha ki (bhala) khuda kee taraph (bulaane mein) mere madadagaar kaun log hain to havaareen bol uthe the ki ham khuda ke anasaar hain to banee isaraeel mein se ek giroh (un par) eemaan laaya aur ek giroh kaaphir raha, to jo log eemaan lae hamane unako unake dushamanon ke muqaabale mein madad dee to aakhir vahee gaalib rahe
